info_text: Trakd is an application that allows you to keep track of the TV Shows you have watched. Trakd is a completely free tracking app and does not require any account. Trakd does not provide any form of registration and makes its features available completely free to end users. Add your favorite TV Shows to your collection, mark the episodes you have watched and take advantage of the minimal synchronization service provided by the application. In the "Backup" section you can import and export the backup of you collection, you will find the instructions on the page. Browse freely between TV Shows, find you favorites and discover new ones. Trakd uses the remote API service offered by TMDB to build its huge TV Shows catalog.
backup_import_text: Click on "import backup" to synchronize your personal collection. NOTE: The import operation overwrites any changes made to the personal collection not previously exported. To export the collection status, click "export backup".
backup_export_text: Click on "export backup" to synchronize the status of your personal collection. NOTE: the export operation updates the collection status, to import the changes and re-synchronize the collection to the last backup, click on "import backup"
